about_the_game:
This demo version not only offers a tantalizing glimpse into the main game but also grants you early access to the excitement. Ensure you don't miss out on any updates by adding it to your wishlist now. Seize the opportunity to dive into the adventure ahead of time!

Welcome to Miami, the city of sun, sand, and luxurious neon-lit hotels! In this hotel management simulator, you and your friends can team up to renovate and maintain a hotel, and keep your customers happy.

You've just purchased an old hotel, and it's up to you to bring it back to life. To make the most profit, you'll need to provide exceptional service and create a welcoming environment that keeps customers coming back.

In Miami Hotel Sim, customers will come and stay in your hotel for a few days. As they wander around, they'll spend money on your slot machines, restaurant, bar, and vending machine, allowing you to improve your hotel and make even more profit. To attract more customers and make more money, you'll need to upgrade and beautify your hotel, making it a heavenly retreat in the heart of Miami.

However, with more customers comes more responsibility. Customers can be messy, leaving garbage on the floor, clogging toilets, and messing up their beds. You'll need to clean out the rooms before handing over the keys to the next customer.

Miami Hotel Sim features a range of customization options, allowing you to design and decorate your hotel to your liking.

So gather your friends and embark on the exciting challenge of managing your own hotel in the neon-lit paradise of Miami today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-6600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Transform and manage your dream hotel in vibrant Miami! Renovate your property, delight your guests, and boost your income. Expand your offerings with vending machines and food services to become the ultimate hospitality tycoon!
